contentencoded:
Conservative and liberal activists across the country are speaking out against Common Core State Standards. But Michael Petrilli, who works for the right-leaning Thomas B. Fordham Institute, says the new standards are a huge step forward for American education.


Guest: Michael Petrilli, Executive Vice President, Thomas B. Fordham Institute.
